page.title: 03HALLOW EQUESTRIAN CENTRE
page.content: {Hallow Mill,a}flour mill until 1923,is now a registered{Equestrian Centre. The owners have been giving {riding,dressage, jumping lessons and {livery}for 15 years.There are {qualified teaching staff}who give the lessons which last from{1/2 hour to 1 {hour}every day except Monday which is the horses resting day.There are {approx.24 horses,}the oldest is 25,the youngest is 6.Prices of lessons depend on how old the pupil is and how advanced they are. The horses have to be fed before 7a.m. The staff compete in competitions but the Mill itself does not run{gymkhanas.}Ponies are broken in by the staff.They do not belong to the{Pony Club but encourage young riders to join.There are continuous improvements made from converting a barn to making cross country jumps.
